homepage.title: Dokkan Battle Battle
homepage.subtitle: Fight your friends in Multiplayer modes
homepage.description: For the moment Dokkan Battle Battle allows you to play in two multiplayer modes.
homepage.htmlDescription:
The principle and the rules were thought and created by the YouTubers described below.
I thank them for having ideas of multiplayer modes, so that everyone can share their passion of Dragon Ball Z DokkanBattle.

randomRush.title: Random Rush
randomRush.rule1: In Random Rush each player will create a team of 6 characters randomly.
randomRush.rule2: For that, each player needs to fill the number of lines of his box.
randomRush.rule3: Players will draw each turn a random number for the lines and the column.
randomRush.rule4: This will define a character in the box of the concerned player.
randomRush.rule5: In case of duplicate draw, you need to delete the character in-game of your team and redraw a random line and column.
randomRush.rule6: Depends on the number of lines each player has, you can draft a certain number of characters for your team:
randomRush.rule7: 0 <> 10 lines = 1 Draft; 10 <> 20 lines = 2 Drafts; 20 <> More = 3 Drafts
randomRush.rule8: When all players have their 6 characters, you can draw if you want a disadvantage.
randomRush.rule9: Each player can rearrange their team and change the leader of the team.

challengeBattle.title: Challenge Battle
challengeBattle.rule1: On Challenge Battle each player will create a team of 6 characters based on their types.
challengeBattle.rule3: Players will draw each turn a random type of character.
challengeBattle.rule4: When all players have their 6 types of characters, you will define the max team cost.
challengeBattle.rule5: Optional* You can define and draw a joker; the players have the choice to use it or not.
challengeBattle.rule6: Each player has the mission of creating a team with all the types they draw.
challengeBattle.rule7: You can add difficulty to this by defining a limit of times.
